m_szDocSumamry: Energy industry news, analysis, and commentary Everything You Ever Wanted to Know About Electricity Storage (Investors Too) By Smart Grid News on August 12, 2013 at 4:00 PM Quick Take: A decade after its original publication, a coalition of industry organizations has updated its Electricity Storage Handbook. The document was produced in collaboration by Sandia National Laboratory, the Electric Power Research Institute (EPRI), the U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) and the National Rural Electric Cooperative Association (NRECA).
